verbs.description: It [V: does] n't matter what you think about Donald Trump , revelations that one major party ’s administration was spying on another deserves an investigation .
It does [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: matter] [ARG1: what you think about Donald Trump] , revelations that one major party ’s administration was spying on another deserves an investigation .
It does n't matter [ARG1: what] [ARG0: you] [V: think] [ARG2: about Donald Trump] , revelations that one major party ’s administration was spying on another deserves an investigation .
It does n't matter what you think about Donald Trump , revelations that one major party ’s administration [V: was] spying on another deserves an investigation .
It does n't matter what you think about Donald Trump , revelations that [ARG0: one major party ’s administration] was [V: spying] [ARG1: on another] deserves an investigation .
It does n't matter what you think about Donald Trump , [ARG0: revelations that one major party ’s administration was spying on another] [V: deserves] [ARG1: an investigation] .
